text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump This administration stands for divisiveness, there is NO civility, NO decency and NO security, how can there be when the glorious leader only cares about himself. trump is responsible for the deaths of 105,557 AMERICANS because he didn't protect them from the COVID-19 VIRUS. https://t.co/GA5ra49bs5
